short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Online Weather Tab Default Search is a smart search extension that provides a unique search experience powered by Bing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Online Weather Tab Default Search provides an exceptional search results by configuring your Default Search to Online Weather Tab Search.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "Online Weather Tab" Chrome extension and hereby agree to change default search to Online Weather Tab Search provided by the service, and I agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

How to use:
Type preferred search term into the Google Chrome Omnibox. The Online Weather Tab Search will provide exceptional custom search results powered by Bing.
For more technical details you can read about Google Chrome API for Google Chrome Extensions.

You may remove this extension at any time from the chrome extension page.
Visit our website at https://onlineweathertab.com/
Read About us: https://onlineweathertab.com/about-search/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://onlineweathertab.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms and Conditions: https://onlineweathertab.com/terms-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://onlineweathertab.com/uninstalling-a-chrome-extension/

Removal Instructions One:
Step 1: Right click on the extension in the top right corner of your browser.
Step 2: Click ‘Remove’

Or

Removal Instructions Two:
Step 1: Click on the three dots/horizontal lines icon in the top right corner of your Chrome browser.
Step 2: Go to "Settings".
Step 3: On the left-hand side, click on ‘Extensions’
Step 4: Find the extension that you wish to remove and click the ‘Remove’ button.
Step 5: The extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
